name: simpl-prompt
description: Pretty, simple, minimal, customizable and fast ZSH prompt

scripts.postinstall: SIMPL_DEST=/usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions npm run --silent postinstall-link && exit 0; SIMPL_DEST="$PWD/functions" npm run postinstall-link && npm run postinstall-fail-instructions
scripts.postinstall-fail-instructions:
echo "ERROR: Could not automagically symlink the prompt. Either:
1. Check out the readme on how to do it manually: https://github.com/eduarbo/simpl#manually
2. Or add the following to your \`.zshrc\`:

    fpath+=('$PWD/functions')"
